text:
───Fold the corners of the triangle a little...
Then, fold both sides and shape it...

The table napkin basket
is complete☆

I did it...
With this, the home economics assignment is... perfect...!

Placing things like this on the table really brightens up the
atmosphere! It makes me want to try various other things too~

If it's Naa-chan...
It seems like you could... make something really stylish...!

Hehe, thanks! That's right!
Let's do it together, Tenka-chan!

Uh...
Just watching might be... okay...
